1.text: STATIC COOLDOWN: 13 / 12 / 11 / 10 / 9 (BASED ON LEVEL)

0.text: Innate: Periodically, Zyra spawns one or two Seeds nearby that last for 30 seconds, granting  sight over the surrounding area for 1 second.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, Zyra spawns one or two Seeds nearby that last for 30 seconds, granting sight over the surrounding area for 1 second.

1.text: After 1 second, enemy  champions can destroy Seeds by stepping on them.
1.html: After 1 second, enemy champions can destroy Seeds by stepping on them.

2.text: Zyra can only have a total of 8 Seeds planted at a time, preserving Seeds spawned by  Rampant Growth over Seeds spawned by Garden of Thorns.
2.html: Zyra can only have a total of 8 Seeds planted at a time, preserving Seeds spawned by Rampant Growth over Seeds spawned by Garden of Thorns.

1.text: CAST TIME: 0.25

0.text: Active: Zyra sprouts thorny spines at the target location that appear after a 0.625-seconds delay, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Zyra sprouts thorny spines at the target location that appear after a 0.625-seconds delay, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: If Deadly Spine hits a Seed, it sprouts into a  Thorn Spitter that remains for 8 seconds.
1.html: If Deadly Spine hits a Seed, it sprouts into a Thorn Spitter that remains for 8 seconds.

1.text: CAST TIME: NONE

0.text: Active: Zyra plants a Seed at the target location that remains for 60 seconds and grants  sight over the surrounding area, though decreasing in radius after 1 second. After 1.5 seconds, enemy champions can destroy the Seed by stepping on it, which  reveals them for 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Zyra plants a Seed at the target location that remains for 60 seconds and grants sight over the surrounding area, though decreasing in radius after 1 second. After 1.5 seconds, enemy champions can destroy the Seed by stepping on it, which reveals them for 2 seconds.

1.text: Zyra periodically stocks a Seed charge, up to a maximum of 2. Killing an enemy generates 20% charge toward a Seed, increased to 100% for large enemies and whenever scoring an enemy  champion  takedown.
1.html: Zyra periodically stocks a Seed charge, up to a maximum of 2. Killing an enemy generates 20% charge toward a Seed, increased to 100% for large enemies and whenever scoring an enemy champion takedown.

1.text: SPEED: 1150

0.text: Active: Zyra shoots a surge of vines in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  roots them for a duration.
0.html: Active: Zyra shoots a surge of vines in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and roots them for a duration.

1.text: If Grasping Roots hits a Seed, it sprouts into a  Vine Lasher, which remains on the battlefield for 8 seconds.
1.html: If Grasping Roots hits a Seed, it sprouts into a Vine Lasher, which remains on the battlefield for 8 seconds.

1.text: EFFECT RADIUS: 500

0.text: Active: Zyra summons a monstrous thicket at the target location that deals magic damage to enemies hit as it expands.
0.html: Active: Zyra summons a monstrous thicket at the target location that deals magic damage to enemies hit as it expands.

1.text: After 2 seconds, the thicket snaps upward to  knock up enemies within for 1 second.
1.html: After 2 seconds, the thicket snaps upward to knock up enemies within for 1 second.

2.text: Plants hit by the thicket become enraged, restoring Â 50% of their current health, increasing their Â maximum health by 50%, gaining 25% increased size and refreshing their duration while the thicket expands. Additionally they attack in a flurry, launching two shots per attack, dealing ãÂ 150% damage per flurry.Â ããÂ 75% damage per shot.Â ã
2.html: Plants hit by the thicket become enraged, restoring  50% of their current health, increasing their  maximum health by 50%, gaining 25% increased size and refreshing their duration while the thicket expands. Additionally they attack in a flurry, launching two shots per attack, dealing ã 150% damage per flurry. ãã 75% damage per shot. ã
